metadata.Title: CVE-2021-29961 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
When styling and rendering an oversized `<select>` element, Firefox did not apply correct clipping which allowed an attacker to paint over the user interface. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 89.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-29961` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 89.0+build2-0ubuntu1
firefox-geckodriver - 89.0+build2-0ubuntu1
firefox-mozsymbols - 89.0+build2-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '89.0+build2-0ubuntu1').
mozjs78 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
